item.title: Tika add a quote by Irwin Sarason
item.description: "Good friends are good for your health" -- Irwin Sarason

item.title: Tika add a quote by Jim Rohn
item.description: "One of the greatest gifts you can give to anyone is the gift of attention" -- Jim Rohn

item.title: Tika add a quote by Tijn Touber
item.description: "Life is giving. Life is receiving. In short, life is being connected" -- Tijn Touber

item.title: Tika add a quote by Robert Muller
item.description: "To forgive is the highest, most beautiful form of love. In return, you will receive untold peace and happiness" -- Robert Muller

item.title: Tika add a quote by Voltaire
item.description: "Appreciation is a wonderful thing. It makes what is excellent in others belong to us as well." -- Voltaire

item.title: Tika add a quote by Arthur Warwick
item.description: "I had rather do and not promise than promise and not do" -- Arthur Warwick

item.title: Tika add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "A mind is like a parachute. It doesn't work if it is not open." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Tika add a quote by Ann Kaiser Stearns
item.description: "The kindest way of helping yourself is to find a friend" -- Ann Kaiser Stearns

item.title: Tika add a quote by John Wesley
item.description: "Earn all you can, give all you can, save all you can" -- John Wesley

item.title: Tika add a quote by Dwight MacDonald
item.description: "Conversation means being able to disagree and still continue the discussion" -- Dwight MacDonald

item.title: Tika add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "The cure for boredom is curiosity. There is no cure for curiosity." -- Dorothy Parker

item.title: Tika add a quote by Swami Sivananda
item.description: "Put your heart, mind, intellect, and soul even to your smallest acts. This is the secret of success" -- Swami Sivananda

item.title: Tika add a quote by Deepak Chopra
item.description: "In the midst of movement and chaos, keep stillness inside of you." -- Deepak Chopra

item.title: Tika add a quote by Nido Qubein
item.description: "Material success may result in the accumulation of possessions; but only spiritual success will enable you to enjoy them" -- Nido Qubein

item.title: Tika add a quote by Ovid
item.description: "Chance is always powerful. Let your hook be always cast; in the pool where you least expect it, there will be a fish." -- Ovid

item.title: Tika add a quote by Tao Te-Ching
item.description: "To hold, you must first open your hand. Let go" -- Tao Te-Ching

item.title: Tika add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Kind words can be short and easy to speak, but their echoes are truly endless." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Tika add a quote by Patricia Neal
item.description: "A master can tell you what he expects of you. A teacher, though, awakens your own expectations" -- Patricia Neal

item.title: Tika add a quote by Lyndon B. Johnson
item.description: "The noblest search is the search for excellence" -- Lyndon B. Johnson

item.title: Tika add a quote by Norman Cousins
item.description: "Death is not the greatest loss in life. The greatest loss is what dies inside us while we live." -- Norman Cousins

item.title: Tika add a quote by Tarfon
item.description: "Do not keep away from the measure which has no limit, or from the task which has no end" -- Tarfon

item.title: Tika add a quote by Patricia Fripp
item.description: "Technology does not run an enterprise, relationships do" -- Patricia Fripp

item.title: Tika add a quote by Kitty Carlisle Hart
item.description: "A career takes more than talent. It takes character" -- Kitty Carlisle Hart

item.title: Tika add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "If you can't feed a hundred people, feed just one." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Tika add a quote by Auguste Rodin
item.description: "Nothing is a waste of time if you use the experience wisely." -- Auguste Rodin

item.title: Tika add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Tika add a quote by Richard M DeVos
item.description: "Few things in the world are more powerful than a positive push - a smile. A word of optimism and hope, a 'you can do it!' when things are tough" -- Richard M DeVos

item.title: Tika add a quote by Mary Schmich
item.description: "Families are ecosystems. Each life grows in response to the lives around it" -- Mary Schmich

item.title: Tika add a quote by Rudyard Kipling
item.description: "If you can walk with the crowd and keep your virtue, or walk with Kings-nor lose the common touch; If neither foes nor loving friends can hurt you; If all men count with you, but none too much; If you can fill the unforgiving minute with 60 seconds worth of distance run- Yours is the earth and everything that's in it, And-which is more-you'll be a man my son." -- Rudyard Kipling

item.title: Tika add a quote by Dr. Thomas Fuller
item.description: "If you command wisely, you’ll be obeyed cheerfully" -- Dr. Thomas Fuller
